data.text: @zimbio Shannen implored people not to attack the new actresses themselves; they are just trying to work, lol. Which I totally get. She also said that it's a show for a different audience to relate to and we should be proud the original was so successful to make a reboot  possible.

@zimbio Shannen is not telling the old fans to watch this, lol.  Most of us won't- we already know how awful it is.  Just because Shannen has her own opinion, and I liked Prue, does not make me a blind follower.  I won't watch it.  Gave the pilot a chance, it confirmed what I suspected.

@zimbio Plot twist: Fans can think for themselves and won't just forget all that went down. #Charmed 
https://t.co/uuFer2WP3s
